messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Weekly reader
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/21/01 6:41:07 AM Pacific Standard Time, hooperck@alltel.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/21/01 6:41:07 AM Pacific Standard Time,
hooperck@... writes:

<< Hi...
Does anyone remember getting weekly reader in school? I wonder if there
is anyway homeschoolers can get it? Or is there something similar?
Just wondering. >>
yeah we get it thru our hs group. Its pretty schooly, and we basically glance
at it. Cheap tho, $8 yr bi monthly. It comes to one person and we pick it
up at park day.
Kathy

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Weekly reader
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 03/21/2001 2:41:06 PM !!!First Boot!!!, ... I don t know.  But my Mom brought some home from her volunteering at the ps and here is the web
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 03/21/2001 2:41:06 PM !!!First Boot!!!,
hooperck@... writes:


weekly reader


I don't know.  But my Mom brought some home from her volunteering at the ps
and here is the web address from one of hers:

www.weeklyreader.com

Good  luck.

Nance

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Weekly reader
messages.msgSnippet: ann, there is a great magazine in this style called God s World News. It has a christian perspective. If you  are interested write to: God s World Publications
messages.messageBody:
ann, there is a great magazine in this style called God's World News. It has a christian perspective. If you  are interested write to:
God's World Publications
PO box 2330 Asheville, NC 28802-9931
They also have a catalog and a web site:
www.gwbc.com
Johanna
 
----- Original Message -----
From: A. Yates
To: Unschooling
Sent: Wednesday, March 21, 2001 8:37 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Weekly reader

Hi...
Does anyone remember getting weekly reader in school?  I wonder if there
is anyway homeschoolers can get it?  Or is there something similar?
Just wondering...
Ann
